```{r}
inputPanel(
  checkboxGroupInput("country", label = ("Country"), choices = unique((rate$country), selected = Algeria))
)

renderPlot({
  filter(country == inpute$country) %>%
    ggplot(aes(year, number, color = country)) + geom_line()
})
```
